entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command: Taking time to execute the queries because of new DateOnly datatype in .NET 8 #35248

Closed

  • Regression when using ImmutableArray's Contains, while Array's Contains method still works. #35102
    9.0.1
  • Error in Generated Migration Script for dotnet-ef 8.0.11 #35132
    9.0.x
  • Scaffolding: Optionally including the `nullable` directive for generated code #33426
  • SQLite Error 19: 'FOREIGN KEY constraint failed'. exception is thrown in case of foreign key constraint is configured in base class's EntityTypeConfiguration #34761

PullRequests

Created

  • Change ExecuteUpdate to accept non-expression lambda #35257
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35256
  • Don't attempt to remove a detached entry from the local view #35253
  • Don't escape separator characters in single key values #35252

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0-staging' into release/9.0 #35255
  • [release/9.0] Fix Contains on ImmutableArray #35251
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Add more specific messages when pending model changes are detected #35221
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix test on newest SQL Server (not run on CI ATM) #35254
  • [release/9.0] Fix query filters with context accessors #35246
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Set environment variables to "Development" when creating DbContext using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #35230
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Prevent owner entity from becoming optional #35222
    Servicing-approved
  • Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35177
  • Fix Contains on ImmutableArray #35247
  • [release/9.0] Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35241
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/9.0] Uniquify all variables used in SQL Server migration scripts #35228
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Add SqlServer translation for DateOnly.ToDateTime(timeOnly) #35194
